alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 4:44PM CDT until October 04 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Foard County in northern Texas... Knox County in northern Texas... Southeastern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 444 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Swearingen to 5 miles east of Chalk to 8 miles southeast of Guthrie, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crowell, Benjamin, Margaret, Vera, Thalia, Truscott, Gilliland, Copper Breaks State Park, and Rayland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
